incidentApproximateDate.description: Approximate date of which the incident took place

incidentApproximateTime.description: Approximate time of which the incident took place

incidentDateTimeDescription.description: Additional details of the date/time of which the incident took place

incidentEndDateTime.description: Exact end time of which the incident took place

incidentExactTimeKnown.description: Whether the exact times of the incident is known

incidentStartDateTime.description: Exact start time of which the incident took place
